Kankurō sends out [[Sasori (puppet)|Sasori]], throwing the opponent up in the air. While in the air, Kankurō activates Sasori's [[flamethrower]]s, ever increasing their intensity. Then, Kankurō finishes it by having Sasori perform a slashing motion with the flames.

== Trivia ==
* ''Katsugeki'', when written as 活劇, means 'action film', and ''geki'' is probably a pun on the word {{translation|'attack'|撃|geki}}.
